main event: A bright, motionless light was seen moving from north to south over Guam.
interesting points: The object was an intense white color and moved in a straight line through 80-100 degrees of the field of view in 10 seconds.
The object was observed through a 20-degree telescope.
The object disappeared due to clouds.
Several follow-up reports were made in the area near Guam Air Force Base on July 27, 1957.
The report includes details about weather conditions and wind speeds at various altitudes.
